title: event.mediaObject
description: A list of media objects related to the [event](../event.json), for example images.

@id.description: A unique URI that acts as globally unique ID for the media object. Based on JSON-LD node identifiers. https://www.w3.org/TR/json-ld/#node-identifiers

@type.description: Indicates the type of the media object. Currently only `schema:ImageObject` is supported (images).

contentUrl.description: URL of the media object file.

thumbnailUrl.description: URL to a thumbnail image of the media object file.

description.description: Description of the media object, in the language used in the `language` property of the media object.

copyrightHolder.description: Name of the copyright holder of the media object.

language.description: Locale of text or speech used in the mediaObject or its description
